short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to count Twitter replies.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension that tracks and counts your daily comments. Itâ€™s designed to help you monitor your progress towards daily engagement targets and makes commenting a bit more fun when everytime you hit reply you can feel reward with number raising.

*It does not have auto reset, when. you start new day, just click "reset" and start commenting.
